data_table.description: EDIC. Cardiovascular disease of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: IOB1B
variable.description: B1b. Recognition of event: if date uncertain

variable.name: IOB3
variable.description: B3. Recognition of event. How did clinic learn of the event
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical exam
Clinic recognized event and informed patient

variable.name: IOC1AI
variable.description: C1ai. Chest pain: left anterior chest

variable.name: IOC1AII
variable.description: C1aii. Chest pain: left arm

variable.name: IOC1AIII
variable.description: C1aiii. Chest pain: jaw

variable.name: IOC1AIV
variable.description: C1aiv. Chest pain: sternum upper/middle

variable.name: IOC1AV
variable.description: C1av. Chest pain: sternum lower

variable.name: IOC1BI
variable.description: C1bi. Pain involve: the back

variable.name: IOC1BII
variable.description: C1bii. Pain involve: the shoulder

variable.name: IOC1BIII
variable.description: C1biiii. Pain involve: the right arm

variable.name: IOC1BIV
variable.description: C1biv. Pain involve: abdomen or both sides

variable.name: IOC2A
variable.description: C2a. Did pain last more than 20 minutes

variable.name: IOC2B
variable.description: C2b. Non-cardiac cause for the pain

variable.name: IOC2C
variable.description: C2c. Self-administered without relief/pain

variable.name: IOC3
variable.description: C3. Patient ever had feeling of pressure

variable.name: IOC4A
variable.description: C4a. Did you get this pain when walk

variable.name: IOC4B
variable.description: C4b. Pain when you walk an ordinary pace

variable.name: IOC4C
variable.description: C4c. When you get this pain what to do

variable.name: IOC4D
variable.description: C4d. What happens to pain / stand still

variable.name: IOC4E
variable.description: C4e. How soon does the pain go away

variable.name: IOD1AI
variable.description: D1ai. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: CPK at least twice upper limit

variable.name: IOD1AII
variable.description: D1aii. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: what was the CPK value

variable.name: IOD1BI
variable.description: D1bi. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: was CPK-MB present

variable.name: IOD1BII
variable.description: D1bii. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: what was the CPK-MB value

variable.name: IOD1CI
variable.description: D1ci. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: either CPK-MB heart fraction

variable.name: IOD1CII1
variable.description: D1cii1. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: CPK-MB heart fraction

variable.name: IOD1CII2
variable.description: D1cii2. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: LDH

variable.name: IOD1CII3
variable.description: D1cii3. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: SGOT

variable.name: IOD1D
variable.description: D1d. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: was there a known non-ischemic

variable.name: IOD1DOTH
variable.description: D1d. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: specify, other

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID

variable.name: IOB1ADAT
variable.description: B1. Recognition of event. Deidentified date of occurrence

variable.name: IOB2BDAT
variable.description: B2. Recognition of event. Deidentified date clinic learned of the event
